sum_bart: InterGlobe Aviation Limited is a private company based in Gurugram, Haryana, India. The company is a member of the National Stock Exchange of India (NSE) and the Bombay Stock Exchange.
sum_peg: Dear Sir/Madam, we wish to inform you that all the securities of the Company are held in dematerialized form and no request for rematerialization of securities has been received by the Company or RTA during the quarter ended March 31, 202.
sum_t5: SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018 (Compliance under Regulation 74(5)) - InterGlobe Aviation Limited
